main event: A semi-circular 'flat' dark object was sighted in Brentwood, Maryland in September 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as 'flat' and semi-circular in shape, which is unusual for conventional aircraft.
There was insufficient data to evaluate the reliability of the witness.
The object was reported to have a straight course and flight path for a duration of 2 minutes.
The color of the object was described as dark, adding to the mystery of its nature.
This sighting took place during the era of Project Blue Book, a significant UFO investigation program by the US Air Force.
